A certain number of clients are included in the topology and work in this number of CLIENTS_WORK_TIME_S of time. +        # Start / stop temp_clients node. Check cluster.

+            self.logger.debug(f'Starting iteration: {i}.')

replies.bodyText: We give the STATIC_CLIENTS_NUM client group time to WORK during the CLIENTS_WORK_TIME_S time for each iteration of the TEMP_CLIENTS_NUM client group entry and exit. This is done in order to get a stable state of the cluster under a stable load after each client login and exit procedure
replies.author: SwirMix
